column4: i am trying to connect to my phone via bluetooth by typing   sudo hidd --connect  00:0A:D9:75:56:AA but nothing happens
no.. that's utilities.. bluetooth applet is a gui program
the laptop cant find the phone but the phone can find the laptop
i try and pair them and connection failes
yeah, it happened to me.. i tried hidd and got it working only once.. but this bluetooth applet did the trick
ok i configured it from there, no luck
umm, it might be "apt-get installed gnome-bluetooth"
gnome-bluetooth fails when trying to start
i think 7.04 and java don't get along
mine loads and the main windows shows for about half a second then it just quits itself
i also tried to use a java applet in firefox and the whole thing crashes
